dataList.content:
<size=75%>View the 1st event Story Stage 
to Unlock</size>

Rarely, you may obtain <color=#ff99e6>[Fixer Recov. Pack]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Mirror Dungeons.

<color=#ff99e6>[Fixer Recov. Pack]</color> is immediately converted to 20 <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> upon acquisition.

During the event, you can earn <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> by clearing event Stages. You can also obtain <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> by clearing Main Story Stages for the first time, or by clearing the Mirror Dungeon.

Rarely, you may obtain <color=#ff99e6>[Fixer Recov. Pack]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Mirror Dungeons,
and <color=#ff99e6>[Fixer Recov. Pack]</color> is automatically converted to 20 <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> upon acquisition.

In the <color=#ff99e6>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards by spending <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> you have collected.

Earn <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> via the following methods:
Event Stage & Dungeon clears, Mirror Dungeon clears,
and Main Story Stage & Dungeon first-time clears.

In the <color=#ff99e6>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards
by spending <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> you have collected.

During the event period, deploying the following Identities or E.G.O on your team will
boost the amount of <color=#ff99e6>[Civilian Recov. Pack]</color> earned.
You can earn a maximum of <color=#ff99e6>120%</color> boost to the amount of event currency earned.
